testimonial: "Being part of Tech Sisters Kenya has been a game-changer for me. The mentorship I've received has given me the confidence to tackle new challenges at work."
name: Mary Wanjiku

testimonial: "Creating an inclusive space for women in tech has been an incredibly rewarding experience. It is a joy to see their growth and progress - Loud, Proud, Unstoppable!."
name: Val Bosibori

testimonial: "I joined Tech Sisters Kenya in my quest for community in the tech space. It has provided invaluable networking opportunities and mentorship."
name: Bridgit Kithinji

testimonial: "One of my favorite things about Tech Sisters Kenya is the inclusivity, and diversity of all things tech - ranging from mental health to career growth and tech culture."
name: Sally Kahoro
